title: WTB: Cubs with Polar Bear backs/Any Polar Bear backs
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTB: Cubs with Polar Bear backs/Any Polar Bear backs
posts.post_content:
I really like the design of the Polar Bear set. I already have about 10 or so of them. I've also decided that I want to start collecting the Chicago Cubs subset after the acquisition a Evers and Chance. 

Please PM me if you have any raw or graded, prefer raw, t206 cards. Particularly Cubs, but I would like to see any that people have for sale. Looking for good to very good condition please :)
Picked up a Pfeister from Erick. Thanks! Please keep sending me offers. Like I said, prefer raw polar bear cards in good to very good shape. Thanks!
Good luck with your team set
Thanks buddy :) let me know if you ever need any help!
You should update your signature isnt your monster number in the 110s :p
You're right bud I forgot about that! Thank you :)
